Headline: #94 South California Temporary Reroute at California/60th
ShortDescription: #94 South California buses are temp rerouted in both directions via California, 63rd, Western, 59th and California, due to police activity near California/60th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 South California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via California, 63rd, Western, 59th and California, then resume their normal route: due to police activity near California/60th.

Allow extra travel time.
